  • Perfectionism
    14 Jul 2012
    I have a problem. I’m a perfectionist. But not the good kind, where you work tirelessly to produce something that’s just right in every way. No, I work very hard and I try to make things great, but I still make tradeoffs to ship something and get feedback, to release when there’re diminishing returns on continued work. ⇒
